original: intros. unfold is_RInt_gen. intros H. unfold is_RInt_gen in H. unfold is_RInt_gen. apply is_RInt_gen_swap in H. apply is_RInt_gen_ext with (f0 := fun y => opp (f y)) in H. apply H. apply filter_forall. intros. rewrite Rmin_comm. rewrite Rmax_comm. apply filter_prod_proper. intros. simpl. apply Ropp_involutive. apply H.
